    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EllipseHelper(int x, int y, double[] coeffs)
      constructor w/ center x, y and coefficients v0x, v1x, v0y, v1y, e0sq, e1sq that are the eigenvectors and values of the ellipse calculated from the spatial moments of the ellipse.
      EllipseHelper(int x, int y, algorithms.util.PairIntArray xy)
      constructor w/ center x, y and points of the ellipse
